title: Health spending as percent of GDP in South Korea 2000 to 2018
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Percentage of GDP. In total the number of data points it has is 19.
Overall Percentage of GDP has increased over the Year.

Percentage of GDP is slightly increasing from 2000 to 2003, roughly constant from 2003 to 2004, gradually increasing from 2004 to 2009, roughly constant from 2009 to 2013, and finally slightly increasing from 2013 to 2018.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2000 and 2001.
The highest Percentage of GDP, of value 8.1 was reached at Year 2018
The lowest Percentage of GDP, of value 4.0 was reported at Year 2000
